div.p: This value set expansion contains 7 concepts.

description.value: ValueSet IMMZD2DTHepatitisAInactivatedHAV1Dose for IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis A.Inactivated HAV 1 dose. Business rule: Determine if the client is due for a hepatitis A vaccination according to the national immunization schedule Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any Table: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 1-dose schedule
